document.full_text: after a token pay of just $1 a year, citigroup's chief executive, vikram s. pandit, will earn $23.2 million if he meets certain goals.
document.title: as citi revives, pandit wins big pay package
lines_and_colors: after a token pay of just $1 a year, citigroup's chief executive, vikram s. pandit, will earn $23.2 million if he meets certain goals.
